storyboards.crucial: An Orange Tabby Cat sits at a table wearing a lapel mic. Crucially, reindeer plushies are visible on the top left shelf, and penguin plushies on the top right. Camera is LOCKED/STATIC on a tripod. Lighting is warm golden.
storyboards.crucial_zh: 一只橘猫戴着领夹麦克风坐在桌前。关键是，左上角架子上可见驯鹿毛绒玩具，右上角可见企鹅毛绒玩具。摄像机固定/静止在三脚架上。灯光为暖金色。
storyboards.action: The cat performs the intro sequence: 1. Raises right paw to wave hello. 2. Brings BOTH paws to cheeks to squish face gently. 3. Puts paws down and tilts head left then right. 4. Opens mouth slightly for a meow.
storyboards.action_zh: 猫咪执行开场动作：1. 举起右爪挥手问好。2.哪怕双爪放在脸颊上轻轻挤压脸部。3. 放下爪子，左右歪头。4. 微微张嘴喵叫。
storyboards.negative_constraint: No eating yet. No camera movement. No zooming.
storyboards.negative_constraint_zh: 还没开始吃。无摄像机移动。无变焦。
storyboards.sound: Cute meow sound, soft rustle of fur.
storyboards.sound_zh: 可爱的喵叫声，轻微的毛发摩擦声。
storyboards.prompt:
[关键] An Orange Tabby Cat sits at a table wearing a lapel mic. Crucially, reindeer plushies are visible on the top left shelf, and penguin plushies on the top right. Camera is LOCKED/STATIC on a tripod. Lighting is warm golden.
[动作] The cat performs the intro sequence: 1. Raises right paw to wave hello. 2. Brings BOTH paws to cheeks to squish face gently. 3. Puts paws down and tilts head left then right. 4. Opens mouth slightly for a meow.
[音效] Cute meow sound, soft rustle of fur.
[禁止] No eating yet. No camera movement. No zooming.
[一致性约束] STAY CONSISTENT: The warm, bright studio lighting must remain unchanging throughout the entire video, do not shift to cold or dark tones. The pet's identity, fur color (as shown in the opening image), and facial structure must be perfectly stable, with no morphing or darkening over time. High fidelity preservation of the initial state.

storyboards.crucial: Orange Tabby Cat at table. Left Anchor: Cookie plate. Right Anchor: Fruit bowl. Camera is STATIC.
storyboards.crucial_zh: 橘猫在桌前。左锚点：饼干盘。右锚点：水果碗。摄像机静止。
storyboards.action: Cat reaches to the LEFT plate, picks up a brown bear-shaped cookie, brings it to the center, and takes a distinct bite.
storyboards.action_zh: 猫咪伸向左边的盘子，拿起一块棕色熊形饼干，拿到中间，明显地咬了一口。
storyboards.negative_constraint: No morphing cookies. No reaching for background shelf.
storyboards.negative_constraint_zh: 饼干无变形。禁止伸手去够背景架子。
storyboards.sound_zh: 响亮的折断声，嘎吱声，研磨声。
storyboards.prompt:
[关键] Orange Tabby Cat at table. Left Anchor: Cookie plate. Right Anchor: Fruit bowl. Camera is STATIC.
[动作] Cat reaches to the LEFT plate, picks up a brown bear-shaped cookie, brings it to the center, and takes a distinct bite.
[音效] Loud Snap, Crunch, Grinding.
[禁止] No morphing cookies. No reaching for background shelf.
[一致性约束] STAY CONSISTENT: The warm, bright studio lighting must remain unchanging throughout the entire video, do not shift to cold or dark tones. The pet's identity, fur color (as shown in the opening image), and facial structure must be perfectly stable, with no morphing or darkening over time. High fidelity preservation of the initial state.

storyboards.crucial: High quality, detailed fur texture. Crucially, the small black lavalier microphone clipped to the white fur on the cat's chest must remain clearly visible and attached throughout the entire video, moving naturally along with the cat's breathing and body movements. It must not disappear or float. All items on the table (cake, fruit, cups) and the background decorations must remain perfectly stationary.
storyboards.action: The orange tabby cat holding the purple bunny cookie nibbles on it enthusiastically. The cookie gets smaller and disappears as the cat eats. The cat chews with visible mouth movements. After swallowing, it smacks its lips repeatedly, savoring the delicious taste. Then, the cat lifts the same paw to gently wipe its mouth and whiskers clean. The movements are natural, relaxed, and cute.
storyboards.negative_constraint: No disappearing microphone, floating microphone, missing objects, vanishing background elements, morphing cookie before eating, distortion, blurry, shaky camera, extra limbs, unnatural movement, scary face, dark lighting.
storyboards.negative_constraint_zh: 麦克风不消失。摄像机不晃动。
storyboards.sound: Clear ASMR eating sounds. Crunchy biting noises of a biscuit, followed by soft chewing sounds. Distinct lip-smacking sounds ("nom nom" noises) after swallowing. Soft rustling sound when the paw wipes the mouth. No background music, just pure cute eating foley.
storyboards.sound_zh: 快速的咀嚼声，碎屑掉落声。

It must not disappear or float. All items on the table and the background decorations must remain perfectly stationary. maintain absolute visual consistency with the initial reference frame throughout the entire sequence: continuous uninterrupted single shot video, seamless fluid motion, no cuts, no jump cuts, no camera angle changes, designed as one smooth long take sequences.
storyboards.crucial_zh: 橘猫面向前方。中心物品：彩虹蛋糕。摄像机静止。
storyboards.action: Cat leans forward to the CENTER rainbow cake and takes a large bite of the top frosting and flower decoration.
storyboards.action_zh: 猫咪向前探身靠近中间的彩虹蛋糕，大口咬下顶部的糖霜和花朵装饰。
storyboards.negative_constraint: No messy face morphing. No sliding cake.
storyboards.negative_constraint_zh: 面部无变形。蛋糕不滑动。
storyboards.sound: Soft Squish, Creamy Smack, Muffled Chew.
storyboards.sound_zh: 柔软的挤压声，奶油吧唧声，闷闷的咀嚼声。

storyboards.crucial_zh: 橘猫在桌前。灯光温暖。摄像机静止。
storyboards.action: Cat takes another bite of the CENTER cake, this time biting into the sponge layers. Chews with satisfaction.
storyboards.action_zh: 猫咪再咬一口中间的蛋糕，这次咬到了海绵蛋糕层。满足地咀嚼。
storyboards.negative_constraint: No distorted paws. No changing cake color.
storyboards.negative_constraint_zh: 爪子无变形。蛋糕颜色不改变。
storyboards.sound: Soft chewing, gulping, moist cake sound.
storyboards.sound_zh: 轻柔的咀嚼声，吞咽声，湿润的蛋糕声。

storyboards.action: Cat reaches to the RIGHT bowl, picks up a round orange melon ball, and eats it in one go.
storyboards.action_zh: 猫咪伸向右边的碗，拿起一个圆形的橙色哈密瓜球，一口吃掉。
storyboards.negative_constraint: No splashing liquid. No floating fruit.
storyboards.negative_constraint_zh: 无液体飞溅。无漂浮水果。
storyboards.sound: Wet Slurp, Juicy Squish, Crisp Snap.
storyboards.sound_zh: 湿润的吸溜声，多汁的挤压声，清脆的咬断声。

storyboards.crucial_zh: 橘猫在桌前，面前是吃了一部分的食物。背景架子静止。摄像机静止。
storyboards.action: Outro Option B: The cat slowly lowers its upper body, rests its chin gently on its front paws on the table, looks at the lens, and blinks slowly.
storyboards.action_zh: 结尾选项B：猫咪慢慢放低上半身，将下巴轻轻搁在桌上的前爪上，看着镜头，缓慢眨眼。
storyboards.negative_constraint: No sudden movements. No purring sound.
storyboards.sound: Soft 'Rustle' of fur settling. Cute breathy exhale. NO background music.
storyboards.sound_zh: 毛发安顿的轻微沙沙声。可爱的呼吸声。无背景音乐。
